sentences: Aju on inimese kõige tähtsam elund.
Tema aju oli väga terav ja ta lahendas keerukaid matemaatilisi ülesandeid.
Väike laps areneb kiiresti ja temaaju muutub pidevalt.
context: In Estonian, 'aju' means brain and refers to the organ that is responsible for thought, memory, and control of the body. It can also refer more broadly to a person's intellect or mental abilities. The word is in singular form here (nominative case).
